timeline.bodyText:
Note that this does not actually update the wrapper. To update the wrapper you'd need to change gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties like done for the examples.
I wonder if we should remove this block. Wouldn't it default to the current gradle version otherwise? That would be exactly what we want.
timeline.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText:
Oof sorry - on phone couldn't see the path was for the examples.
Yeah I think we can remove the block, otherwise you have to run the wrapper task twice anyways to make sure the gradlew script is actually updated.
replies.author: anuraaga
